comments.body: ðŸš€ We are excited to announce that one of our most beloved projects is the Talent School, where we promote an interdisciplinary approach to education, combining the fields of physics, biology, chemistry, technology, programming, and more. This will be the cornerstone of our startup and one of the most important initiatives we undertake.We will be creating two programs: one based in our physical school and another available online. Our goal is to provide comprehensive and innovative educational experiences that nurture creativity, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills in students.Through our Talent School, we aim to empower the next generation of innovators and leaders by offering them a unique learning environment where they can explore diverse scientific disciplines and develop a deep understanding of their interconnectedness.Stay tuned for more updates as we unveil further details about our Talent School programs and how you can be a part of this transformative educational journey! ðŸŽ“ðŸŒŸ

comments.author: disconnectme
comments.body: It seems there is no interest in this project, just look through your ICO page only 3 BNB raised so far and looking at the design of this project it is a security also there are several typographical errors on your website which is a big concern and red flag to me. A professional team should not project a bad image like this because the website is the first call when you want to learn more about a project.
